extendedInfo.description: TEXTFREE + FREE CALLING = PINGERWe started with the USAâs #1 free texting app, added free calling, and created a whole new mega app. Introducing Pinger for Android. Let freedom ring!FREE SMS PLUS FREE CALLING TO ANY PHONEPinger gives your Android phone free text messaging AND now free calling to any phone, including landlines and non-smartphones, in the US and Canada. Your friends donât need Pinger to receive -- they donât even need to have a smartphone. You get your own real phone number that you can use to call and SMS any phone number in Canada and the US, even if you donât have a calling plan.TEXTING IS UNLIMITED; EARN MINUTES FOR FREE OUTBOUND CALLSAs always, texting is totally free and unlimited. Incoming calls are free. You get 10 free minutes to start, then you earn minutes for additional free outbound calls. And if you run out of minutes, it's easy to buy super cheap minutes. TEXTFREE USERS: YOU WANT THIS APP!Finally, free your voice on your Android device.  Login to keep your Textfree number and get the new features youâve been asking for.  Itâs the biggest improvement to Textfree since, well, free texting.â¢ Free calls to any phone in the US and Canada â¢ Get a free second line for your phoneâ¢ Send unlimited free SMS to more than 35 countriesâ¢ Get full screen text and call notifications â¢ Know the instant someone reads your textsâ¢ Sync your contacts' photos with Facebook â¢ One view for texts, calls and voicemailsâ¢ Faster, more reliable, easier to use than TextfreeBETTER THAN THOSE MESSENGER APPSWith Pinger you can call or text any phone number, even if they donât have Pinger and even if they donât have a smartphone! â¢ Call or text your grandmotherâs non-smartphone in Minneapolis--FREE.â¢ Call any restaurant in New York to make reservations--FREE.â¢ Text a co-worker in Dallas or Toronto as much as you want--FREE.â¢ Messenger apps only work for text messages or calls between people using the app. And only when they have a smartphone.NO NEED FOR MULTIPLE TEXTING & CALLING APPSNow you donât need to know what messenger apps your friends, family or co-workers use. Pinger does it all. Just use their mobile phone number and your texts are 100% free. Earn minutes for free calling to any phone in the US and Canada. Itâs that simple.PINGER IS MORE THAN A MESSENGERWhen your friends have Pinger talking and texting gets even better. The calls are in HD, so they sound great. And you and your friends get unlimited free calls (talk as long as you like) and unlimited free texts (goodbye 160 character limit!) to and from one another, anywhere in the world.  PACKED WITH ADDITIONAL FEATURESâ¢ Call or text for free back to the US and Canada from anywhere in the world when you have a data connection or WiFiâ¢ Zillions of ringtones and text tonesâ¢ Log in to your account from any deviceâ¢ Call and text anyone on Pinger in more than 200 countriesOTHER IMPORTANT INFOâ¢ Emergency calls are not supportedâ¢ Pinger is ad-supported, so you will see ads from time to timeâ¢ Tablet support coming soonâ¢ When roaming, additional carrier data charges may apply. Contact your carrier for details.CONNECT WITH USâ¢ facebook.com/pingerâ¢ twitter.com/pinger

reviews.title: Awesome App!!
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app.  I wish it was able to make it so I can make pinger as the primary App for dialers and messaging. Pinger please add this!
reviews.author: MettaW Peace

reviews.title: COOL
reviews.comment: I Like it but you only get a certain amount of minutes and it\'s suppost to be free right??? And I don\'t always get the whole message that someone sends me, it will show me the message in parts and I don\'t always get all of the message t makes me so aggravated! And my texts come later than they used to I used to get them right when my friend sent the text but now I get the text about 10 minutes later! PLEASE FIX!
reviews.author: Kailei Gardner

reviews.title: Needs more work..
reviews.comment: It was OK a first,loved the setup and how you could personalize the ringtone unlike the regular text free but after a few days it stopped alerting me of messages, never even tried the calling
reviews.author: Amber Harrison

reviews.title: Samsung Admire
reviews.comment: Does not let me send mms messages to other phone numbers and about a 2 sec delay on phone calls. also my phone will ring and it never gives me the option to answer it but continues ringing. Pls fix!
reviews.author: Naomi Avila

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Really helps you save minutes and comes in handy. I love this! Very useful, you won\'t regret downloading.
reviews.author: Riley Wagner

reviews.title: Need some fixing!
reviews.comment: When I got it on my phone it worked perfectly fine. I started to use it frequently and now the texts come in late. If you text someone you can see your text but not their reply!!!! Please fix and update!!
reviews.author: Enrique Rivera

reviews.title: Error?!
reviews.comment: When I click on da.app it.says error then when I uninstall n reinstall it says error again please fix soon!!! It was workin fine until now
reviews.author: Jakeaquria Wilkerson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is really great it gives you a real phone number and the minutes are really easy to earn if you don\'t care to buy them. 5 STARS hands down, only issue is sending pics but it still works fine for a free app
reviews.author: Kaycee Gosselin

reviews.title: Below average!
reviews.comment: It used to be fine. Now, wheneva\' I cal, or someone calls me, it starts to break up. Either I can\'t hear whoever called, or they can\'t hear me.
reviews.author: Junior Bell

reviews.title: Please update
reviews.comment: I love the app but lately I\'ve been getting texts late and it really sucks because I will keep texting someone and it looks like they\'re not texting back but later on, their texts will pop up in between my consecutive texts. Also, we used to be able to see the time the text was sent and recieved but now I can only see the date. Please update the app please.
reviews.author: Tiffany Guerrero

reviews.title: A few bugs, but DOES work!
reviews.comment: If your incoming calls/texts are delayed you can manually get them by opening Pinger\'s in-app menu and pushing \"REFRESH\". That will update it & show received txts/calls. It\'s still a pain to have to sit there and wait for every txt reply and call... PLEASE FIX THE NOTIFICATION PROBLEM PINGER!  Otherwise, great app... Would be 5/5 stars if it was on time with incoming notifications.
reviews.author: Paul Walsh

reviews.title: Evo 3D
reviews.comment: My text always come late. Also when I\'m on the app I don\'t get the notifications of a text.. wish the format was different. Whenenever i call people all you hear is an echo. but all in all the app is good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please update!!
reviews.comment: Samsung stratosphere, just installed this couple days ago. Love the interface, but get absolutely no notifications unless I go to the app or refresh it. Tried to reinstall, no change. Also, please add Facebook chat as an option like text free?
reviews.author: Valerie Hoaglund

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I find this app helpful. But the only prob is that everytime i go to it, it takes like 10 mins to load (not literally) Please fix....
reviews.author: Etravia Harris

reviews.title: Aggravating
reviews.comment: I have the maximum amount of bars, yet it tells me that it cant connect, or something went wrong, and dont get me started on the call quality!! I can barely be heard and vise versa. It works when it wants to, but otherwise im screwed!
reviews.author: Deja Green

reviews.title: Cant receive messages lately
reviews.comment: My friends send me messages but I cant open to read it.... it use to work properly. ... but these past days it doesn\'t work... i cant read my messages at all.  Sucks!
reviews.author: Athena N

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: excellent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works but......
reviews.comment: It could work better. skit of calls where they can\'t hear me.
reviews.author: Eve Moore

reviews.title: Loading
reviews.comment: If you enjoy to watch loading screens for 30 minutes so you can send a text message, then receive a text 15 minutes later you won\'t be able to respond to until you\'ve witnessed 30 more minutes of loading... This app is for you. It used to be a good app when it was \"textfree\", wtf Pinger?
reviews.author: Cameron Johnston

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Text works great. phone not so much. No one can hear me
reviews.author: ryan leach
